title: The Wake Trilogy
description: This boxed set contains all three books in the bestselling WAKE trilogy: Wake, Fade, Gone.Janie Hannagan gets sucked into other people's dreams. It's an ability she always kept secretâ€”until she met Cabel, and found herself with the best (secret) boyfriend ever. But Janie and Cabel are about to find out just how dark Janie's future as a Dream Catcher is... and whether Cabel will be a part of it.
author: Lisa McMann
